h2_title: Green-Capped Martialist Boss Fight and Guide
content: Since he's such a cagey foe, getting a lock on him will be the hardest part of the fight, so you'll want to rely on slowing him down by deflecting his ambushes, or Immobilizing him before he can flee and expend your focus points for big hits. Don't bet on slow attacks or Spirits that take too long, or he'll run away before the hits can land.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Green-Capped_Martialist.md', within the main section titled 'Green-Capped Martialist', specifically from the subsection 'Green-Capped Martialist Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Since he's such a cagey foe, getting a lock on him will be the hardest part of the fight, so you'll want to rely on slowing him down by deflecting his ambushes, or Immobilizing him before he can flee and expend your focus points for big hits. Don't bet on slow attacks or Spirits that take too long, or he'll run away before the hits can land.
